feature_model.name: Conference_Context
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Conference_Context (Conference_Context) :o Person (Person) :g [1, *] : EventsPreference (EventsPreference) : ContactDetails (ContactDetails) : Location (Location) :g [1, 1] : BuildingResolution (BuildingResolution) : RoomResolution (RoomResolution) : Publications (Publications) :g [1, *] : JournalPapers (JournalPapers) : ConferencePapers (ConferencePapers) : BookChapters (BookChapters) :o Conference (Conference) :o Venue (Venue) :o ParticipatingPeople (ParticipatingPeople) :g [1, *] : PhDStudent (PhDStudent) : Experts (Experts) :g [1, 1] : HavingJournalPublications (HavingJournalPublications) : HavingAwards (HavingAwards)
